name: The Cheese
description:
You wake up in a kitchen. Cheese is in front of you. 

THIS GAME HAS NSFW JOKES, PLAY WITH CAUTION 

This was just an experiment! It's the first game I've made that wasn't just random stuff to practice. I'm new to Squiffy and html, so cut me a little slack.
